Text:
Use Wii Backup Manager to copy the file to your external hard drive or to convert it from .wbfs to .iso to burn on a disc.

http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=188295
This has already been uploaded in wbfs file format on tpb here -> http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5480222/%5BWii%5DSushi.Go.Round%5BNTSC%5D%5BScRuBBeD%5D.wbfs
Screw these silly games, bring us an early Monster Hunter Tri release!!!!
